instruction: Add a star to every email in local Bills folder

minimal: `CLICK` on the menu button (three horizontal lines)
`CLICK` on the 'Perform these actions:' dropdown and select 'Add Star'
`CLICK` on the dropdown at the top to select your local 'Bills' folder (if necessary)
